metadata.titel_preek: Das achte Gebot: Du sollst nicht falsch Zeugnis reden wider deinen Nächsten

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The human subject must protect the truth and the 'social body' of the neighbor against systemic lies, propaganda, and the cynicism of power to create a climate of trust.

subject.identificatie: The Human / The Hearer / The Preacher
tekstueel_bewijs: Ich muss zunächst einmal um den Raum kämpfen
Ich muss gegen den Zynismus der Macht angehen
Du wirst die Wahrheitsfrage nicht abdrängen

object.identificatie: Truth / Human Rights / Protection of the Neighbor

tekstueel_bewijs: Die Zehn Gebote Gottes... begriffen als die unveräußerlichen Rechte des Menschen

ontvanger.identificatie: The Neighbor / The Poor / The Oppressed
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: Does hearer identify with Subject or Receiver?

tekstueel_bewijs: Luther hat in seinen Auslegungen... Stellung genommen
Ich habe mich dann mit anderen Christen darüber beratschlagt
helper.rol_van_god: Absent (God is the source of the rule, but not the actor in the struggle)

tekstueel_bewijs: Der gefährlichste Feind der Wahrheit ist der Erfolg
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is structural and political rather than ontological or spiritual (Sin/Death).

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: There is no distinct soteriological program where God acts to save the incompetent human.
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The sermon remains entirely within the ethical/horizontal plane.

voorbeelden_god_subject: die Wahrheit... wird uns frei machen
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Ich muss gegen den Zynismus der Macht angehen
Du wirst nicht als falscher Zeuge aussagen
Wir müssen von diesem Gebot aus Anfragen stellen

voorbeelden: Ich muss um den Raum kämpfen
Ich war mir nicht klar, ob ich die Information verwerten sollte
Am besten versteht derjenige die Gebote...
Wahrheit, soweit ich sie erkennen kann
Wahrheitsfähigkeit des Mediums erst einmal wiederherstellen

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is an appeal to the will and the duty of the human subject. It assumes the human 'can' if they 'must'.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From the violation of S1 (Haiti/Israel) to the negation of S1 (Success-logic in media) to the demand for S1.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in human ethical courage, not divine intervention.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: S2 is seen as a social/political evil, not a radical spiritual corruption.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon functions as a political-ethical lecture. God is the 'Sender' of the law but is not an active 'Subject' in the narrative. The focus is entirely on human performance.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Ich muss... kämpfen; Wir müssen... fragen.
The commandments are 'Rights of Man' (Droits de l'homme).

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: Jesus von Nazareth [war] auch nicht konsensfähig.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Jesus and Luther are used as models of 'non-consensus' and 'courageous speech'.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Christ as the Truth who speaks for us when we are silenced by sin.

identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Salvation/Justification is replaced by ethical integrity.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: Highly coherent as a political manifesto, but lacks theological depth regarding the human inability to fulfill the law.
spanning_punten: The shift from God's command to 'Human Rights' creates a secularized framework.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: The truth will set us free (interpreted as ethical clarity).

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: None; competence is assumed to be inherent in human reason/will.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is identified as social injustice and lying, not as a condition requiring a Savior.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a 'Subject-Shift' away from God. Man is the hero fighting the 'Opponent' (Success/Lies).

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: The preacher and hearer are the only active subjects.
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: God as the one who speaks the Truth into the human silence of sin.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'We must fight for truth', use 'God's Word breaks through our systems of lies to set us free'.

identificatie_herstel.strategie: Identify the hearer first as the one who is 'belied' by sin and 'spoken for' by Christ.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Focus on how the Spirit enables speech that the world forbids.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Sin as a power that makes us all 'false witnesses' against God.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: Without a heavy opponent, grace is unnecessary.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: 1. God justifies the liar. 2. The justified person speaks truth.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon is rhetorically powerful and ethically passionate, but structurally it is a lecture on human rights rather than a proclamation of the Gospel.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, it is persuasive; actantially, it is vacant of Divine agency.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis is used to support a pre-defined political framework (Human Rights).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that 'God' is merely a label for a human value-system here, not a character who acts.

appendices.notities: The sermon equates the Decalogue with the 'Droits de l'homme', effectively moving the Sender from the Transcendent to the Political.
